title: AWS High Availability to Azure Resilience: Reliability and Business Continuity Planning
description: Master enterprise reliability engineering by implementing AWS high availability and disaster recovery solutions, then migrating to Azure resilience equivalents with backup strategies, failover automation, and comprehensive business continuity planning.
learningObjectives: Design high availability architectures using AWS Multi-AZ and Azure Availability Zones
Implement comprehensive backup and recovery strategies across both platforms
Build automated failover and disaster recovery solutions
Create business continuity plans with RTO/RPO requirements
Design fault-tolerant systems with graceful degradation patterns
Implement chaos engineering and resilience testing methodologies
prerequisites: Completion of SOA-C02 Monitoring, Logging, and Remediation Lab
Understanding of networking and infrastructure concepts
Basic knowledge of database replication and backup concepts
Familiarity with load balancing and traffic distribution
awsServices: Amazon RDS Multi-AZ and Read Replicas
azureServices: Azure Load Balancer and Application Gateway
businessScenario: ReliableCorp operates mission-critical financial services applications that require 99.9% uptime with strict RTO (Recovery Time Objective) of 15 minutes and RPO (Recovery Point Objective) of 5 minutes. They need to implement comprehensive reliability and business continuity solutions across AWS and Azure platforms, including automated failover, disaster recovery, and backup strategies while ensuring regulatory compliance and cost optimization.

topics: AWS Multi-AZ deployments and availability zone distribution
Azure Availability Zones and fault domain configuration
Load balancing strategies and health check implementation

deliverables: Multi-AZ architecture design with zone distribution

sections.title: Backup and Recovery Strategies
topics: AWS Backup service and cross-region backup strategies

Database backup automation and point-in-time recovery
Application-consistent backup procedures
Backup retention policies and compliance requirements

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Backup Strategy
tasks.description: Design and implement enterprise backup and recovery solutions
steps: Configure AWS Backup service with cross-region backup policies
Setup Azure Backup service with geo-redundant backup storage
Implement automated database backup with point-in-time recovery

Setup backup monitoring and alerting for backup failures
deliverables: AWS Backup service configuration with cross-region replication

sections.title: Disaster Recovery and Failover Automation
topics: AWS Site Recovery and cross-region disaster recovery

Incident response procedures and escalation workflows

hands-onExercises.title: Multi-Region Disaster Recovery Implementation
hands-onExercises.description: Build complete disaster recovery solution spanning multiple regions
steps: Design primary and secondary region architecture
Implement data replication across regions with appropriate consistency models
Configure automated health monitoring and failover triggers
Create disaster recovery orchestration workflows
Test end-to-end disaster recovery scenarios
Validate RTO/RPO compliance and document lessons learned
hands-onExercises.expectedOutcome: Production-ready disaster recovery solution meeting strict RTO/RPO requirements

hands-onExercises.title: Chaos Engineering Resilience Testing
hands-onExercises.description: Implement chaos engineering practices to validate system resilience

Implement automated chaos testing using AWS Fault Injection Simulator
Create equivalent chaos testing scenarios in Azure using chaos engineering tools
Monitor system behavior during chaos experiments
Identify and remediate resilience gaps discovered during testing
Create resilience testing playbook and regular testing schedule
hands-onExercises.expectedOutcome: Validated system resilience with documented improvement recommendations

hands-onExercises.title: Enterprise Backup and Recovery Validation
hands-onExercises.description: Validate backup and recovery procedures for enterprise workloads
steps: Create comprehensive backup strategy for multi-tier application
Implement automated backup testing and validation procedures

Test point-in-time recovery scenarios for different failure modes
Validate backup compliance with regulatory requirements

hands-onExercises.expectedOutcome: Validated backup and recovery solution with documented procedures and compliance evidence

troubleshooting.issue: Complex failover procedures causing extended downtime during disasters
troubleshooting.solution: Implement automated failover orchestration, practice regular disaster recovery drills, simplify failover procedures, and implement automated health checks and failover triggers

troubleshooting.issue: Data consistency issues during cross-region replication and failover
troubleshooting.solution: Choose appropriate consistency models for different data types, implement proper synchronization mechanisms, test data consistency during failover scenarios, and monitor replication lag

troubleshooting.issue: High costs associated with disaster recovery infrastructure and backup storage
troubleshooting.solution: Implement tiered disaster recovery strategies, use appropriate storage classes for backups, optimize replication strategies, and implement cost monitoring and optimization
